events.message: I received the wrong size and would like to request a refund for my order number 874532.
The case was categorized under Refund after analyzing the customer's request for money back.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to assist with this customer's issue.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the incorrect size received. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Thank you for responding promptly. I have attached a photo showing that the size does not match my order.
We have reviewed the photo and approved your refund. You will receive your money back within 5 business days.
Thank you very much for your help and quick resolution. I appreciate the efficient service.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please allow 5 business days to see the amount in your account.
Following up to ensure you have received the refund. Please let us know if there are any further issues.
As there have been no additional concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
